Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); GRAECO-ROMAN PERIOD (not after)
Name: Amulet
Description: A large dark blue-glazed amulet in the form of the udjat-eye. The outlines are in black-glazed relief. At the back is a longitudinal perforation for suspension. The udjat-eye was worn in everyday life but also as a funerary amulet.
